programme.original_title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich S04
programme.description: Oddaja vam odpahne vrata graščin in ponudi VIP vstop v ekskluzivni svet, poln nepredstavljive ekstravagance in nezaslišanega bogastva. Z odprtimi usti boste strmeli v visoke cene, mega domove in lesketajoče se super avtomobile. Oddaja gledalce sooči z najbogatejšimi ljudmi na svetu in pokaže njihov nenasiten apetit po najboljših stvareh ter izda skrivno formulo na poti do uspeha.

"Secret Lives of the Super Rich" unlocks the mansion gates and scores you the ultimate VIP access to an exclusive world filled with unimaginable extravagance and enormous fortunes. Beyond the jaw-popping price-tags, mega-homes, and shiny super-cars the series brings viewers face-to-face with some of the wealthiest people on the planet revealing their voracious appetite for the best of the best,...

programme.original_title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich S04

David Tutera se vrača s še več nevestami, ki obupno potrebujejo pomoč pri poročnem dnevu. Nekatere neveste želijo obleko iz risank, okrasje v slogu merlota, polne mize kristalov in srednjeveško zabavo. David ima ogromno dela, ko spreminja katastrofalne zamisli v prekrasne poroke.

David Tutera is back, with more brides in desperate need of a wedding day do over. There are brides who want Little Bo Peep dresses, décor based on merlot wine, tables dripping with crystals, or medieval-themed parties. David’s got his work cut out transforming these calamitous celebrations into wonderful weddings.

V seriji Polnočna pojedina vam bo italijanski oddelek za hrano v New Yorku predstavil epski polnočni kulinarični obračun med nekaterimi najboljšimi vrhunskimi kuharji v državi. V vsaki edinstveni epizodi se bodo štirje kuharji pomerili v treh krogih z izločanjem, v katerih bodo morali pripraviti predjed, glavno jed in sladico. V vsakem krogu bodo kuharji imeli na voljo katerekoli sestavine, ki jih bodo našli na oddelku s hrano in zelo malo časa za načrtovanje in pripravo jedi. Po vsakem krogu bodo sodniki ocenili jedi glede na predstavitev, okus in ustvarjalnost ter izločili enega kuharja iz tekmovanja. Na koncu bo zmagovalec dobil denarno nagrado, ki predstavlja dvojno vrednost njegovega računa, poraženec pa bo moral plačati svoj račun. Ker imajo dostop do najboljših sestavin na svetu, mora vsak kuhar premisliti, ali je vredno tvegati in pripravljati jedi s temi dragimi in eksotičnimi sestavinami, saj ga sotekmovalec lahko porazi. Samo najbolj drzni in ustvarjalni kuharji bodo lahko premagali tri nasprotnike v treh krogih in si zaslužili slavo in denarno nagrado. Spremljali boste najbolj zahtevno bitko bistrih umov, ustvarjalnosti in veščin, ki jo je kulinarični svet kadarkoli videl.

In MIDNIGHT FEAST, a NYC food-hall (think Eataly) sets the stage for an epic late-night culinary showdown between some of the hottest professional chefs in the country. In each stand-alone episode, 4 chefs go head to head in 3 rounds of elimination: "munchies", "main", and "sweets." In each round, the chefs are given free rein to use any ingredient found in the food hall but have minimal time to plan and execute each dish. After each round, the judges critique the dishes based on presentation, taste, and creativity and cut one chef from the competition. By the end of the night, the winner walks away with a cash prize (twice the cost of their grocery bill!) while the losers walk away paying their own tabs. With access to the finest ingredients in the world, each chef must weigh their desire to use the most expensive and exotic ingredients against the risk of picking up an outlandish bill. Only the most daring and creative chefs will be able to beat three rivals over three courses to win glory and a cash prize. It's the most grueling battle of wits, creativity and skill the food world has ever seen.

V tej resničnostni oddaji spremljamo življenje in posle Katrine Campins, nekdanje zvezde oddaje "Apprentice" in vrhunske nepremičninske agentke iz Miamija. Campinsova skrbi za več kot 350 znanih osebnosti, za športnike in bogate zvezdnike kot so Russell Brand, Katy Perry in Justin Timberlake. Posle vodi z očarljivim bivšim možem, nadzorovalno kubansko mamo in s svojo mlajšo sestro. Gledalci dobijo vpogled v dramo, ki se odvija med delom, ko pomaga strankam kupiti in prodati luksuzne nepremičnine v vročem Miamiju. Od plaže do sejne sobe, serija sledi Katrini in njeni ekipi nepremičninskih agentov med raziskovanjem najbolj luksuznih nepremičnin v Miamiju.

This reality series features the life and business of Katrina Campins, former "Apprentice" star and successful high-end Miami real estate agent. Campins caters to over 350 A-list celebrities, athletes and wealthy professionals, including Russell Brand, Katy Perry and Justin Timberlake. She runs her business with her charming ex-husband, her controlling Cuban mother and her younger sister. Viewers get an inside look at the drama behind helping high-end clients buy and sell luxury real estate in sultry Miami. From the beach to the boardroom, the series will follow Katrina and her team of realtors as they explore Miami's most luxurious properties.

Da bi naredili prvi korak v svet nepremičnin, prvotne kupce ponavadi zanimajo soseske, ki so izgubile svoj ugled. Njihova ustvarjalnost vodi v obnovo krajevnih sosesk, jih iz pozabljenih spremeni v izjemne in jim tako povrne ponos ter njihovo vrednost v skupnosti, ki jih obdaja. V seriji bomo spremljali štiri nadarjene pare, ki bodo tekmovali med seboj v modernih prenovah domov. Poiskali bomo mesto ali kraj, od Buffala do Baltimora, ki je na samem robu uspeha. Vsak par bo dobil v prenovo vrstno hišo. V tem času bo živel v zapuščenem domu in dobil omejena sredstva, da bo lahko preuredil prostore. Končni cilj je povečati vrednost doma, kolikor je to le mogoče. Na koncu pa bodo pari pokazali svoje delo sosedom, ki so ves čas vohunili in ugotavljali, kateri par se je odrezal najbolje.

To take that first critical step onto the property ladder, first-time homebuyers often explore neighborhoods that have lost their luster. Their creativity leads the renovation of local neighborhoods, taking them from forgotten, to fabulous, and restoring the pride and property value of the community surrounding them. "Renovation Row" is a format that pits four talented renovation couples against each other in an on-trend transformation showdown. We will cast a town or city - from Buffalo to Baltimore - that is on the verge of becoming "the next big thing." Each couple will be given one rowhouse to renovate over the course of our series. While living inside these dilapidated homes our couple will use a designated budget to re-do key rooms and spaces in each self-contained episode. The final goal is to increase the overall value of the home by as much as they can. In the finale, the couples will stage an open house for their homes, and our neighborhood families - who have been spying on these newcomers and sharing their opinions with them all along - will have a chance to see the new homes on their street and witness which couple has increased the value to the max.
